DOC.brief_title: Single Photon Emission Computed Tomography Normal Human Brain
DOC.criteria: The study seek recruit 100 normal human subject age 10 90 SPECT brain imaging . Subjects initially screen psychiatric major illness screen questionnaire ; also give standard DSM4 computeradministered questionnaire ( The DISC child teens SCID adult ) . They also meet individually psychiatrist psychological assistant screen interview . 1 . Suicidal think behavior 2 . Any psychiatric diagnosis assignable contemporary DSM nosology 3 . Unstable medical condition 4. epilepsy , serious head injury , significant neurological disorder use central nervous system medication . 5 . Dementia , mental retardation , coma 6 . Substance abuse alcoholism 7 . Unreliability inability adhere requirement study 8 . Inability personally tolerate requirement study 9 . Significant exposure occupational , diagnostic , therapeutic radiation within prior year 10 . Pregnancy breastfeed 11 . A firstdegree relative meeting criterion 1 6 .
